txt.en: 'The odds may be great against us, but it does not mean that I am ready to give up. I have a plan that will allow us to traverse the hills unnoticed.\n\n'Search the slag for any black powder. There may be some within the rubble, thrown out the gate from the scrap mounds in Ud√ªn.'
Black powder may be found within the rubble surrounding the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should collect black powder for Thurindol.
Bring the black powder to Thurindol
Thurindol has a plan, but needs black powder from the scrap scattered about the Slag-hills in order to proceed.
You find nothing of use here
Thurindol can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should return to Thurindol with the black powder you gathered.
'Ah excellent. Yes, this powder is just what we need. I suppose you would like to know what this plan entails then?'
